module.name: Calendar
module.description: This module is used to manage calendar and time based events for FreePBX
module.changelog: *17.0.4.22* Github #717 - Reverting Github Issue #682 fix *17.0.4.21* Github #682 Fixing Reccurent Events do not work with local Calendar *17.0.4.20* FREEI-1133 Fixing google calendar in ical calendar event error. *17.0.1alpha1* 17.0.1 alpha release
